explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques, specifically combining unsupervised and supervised learning, for financial performance prediction.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper mentions the use of supervised learning in conjunction with unsupervised learning to build the financial performance prediction model.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper utilizes unsupervised learning, specifically self-organizing mapping neural networks, as part of the financial performance prediction model.
explanations.classification: The paper classifies the financial performance of enterprises into five levels, indicating the use of classification techniques.
explanations.neural network: The paper employs neural networks, including self-organizing mapping neural networks and convolutional neural networks, in the proposed model.
explanations.deep learning: The paper applies deep learning techniques to financial analysis for constructing the financial performance prediction model.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper specifically mentions the use of convolutional neural networks (CNN) as part of the proposed SNN-CNN model.
explanations.CNN: The paper refers to convolutional neural networks (CNN) as a component of the financial performance prediction model.
